name: True Course Flight School
about: True Course Flight School is a small, highly experienced flight training institution based at Syracuse Hancock Airport in New York. With a team of five dedicated and experienced instructors, we provide personalized, one-on-one flight training in a relaxed and supportive environment. Our students train on carefully maintained aircraft, ensuring safety and optimal learning conditions. We specialize in airplane flight training, offering a comprehensive and tailored approach to help students achieve their aviation goals. Our commitment to quality instruction and student success makes us an excellent choice for aspiring pilots. At True Course Flight School, we are dedicated to helping you take to the skies with confidence and skill.
